text: The 2018 Screen Actors Guild Awards red carpet did not disappoint in the beauty department. From bold and bright lipsticks to playful hair moments even better from the back, there was plenty to keep you inspired. Ahead, see all the standout hair and makeup moments of the evening.
authors: Kristina Rodulfo Is The Beauty Director Of Women'S Health She Oversees Beauty Coverage Across Print
Is An Expert In Product Testing
